mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Virginia / by Jed. Hotchkiss, Top. Eng., Staunton, Va., 1874
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: R.F. Walker, Superintendent of Public Printing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows the natural divisions in color: Tidewater, Middle, Piedmond [sic.], Blue Ridge, The Valley, Appalacia.
Includes much of West Virginia, but not colored by natural division..
Copyright 1875 by Jed. Hotchkiss in lower left corner.
From: Virginia: a geographical and political summary / compiled by Jedediah Hotchkiss, 1876; map between p. 18 and 19.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; copy 1 mounted on linen; copy 2 left margin is not straight (part is torn off)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Physical geography--Virginia--Maps.
Virginia--Maps, Physical.
West Virginia--Maps.
